author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Substructure announcement trailer for this upcoming factory and automation game from the creator of UltraCube (a Factorio mod). Substructure will be available in PC Early Access.

When a mysterious interstellar body appears at the edge of the solar system, it causes equal parts fear and curiosity – could this rogue planet threaten your fragile home, or will it offer opportunity? You arrive on the surface as part of a hastily prepared expeditionary mission explicitly sent to seek an answer to this question. Still, nothing could have prepared you for the journey ahead.

#ign #gaming
title: Substructure - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Two Point Museum's new wildlife sanctuary-slash-museum is out now! Watch the Two Point Museum: Zooseum launch trailer for the DLC for the strategy simulation game. The Two Point Museum: Zooseum DLC brings a new museum location, a new expert type with Wildlife experts, an unexplored expedition map: Far Flung Isles, 40+ Wildlife Exhibits – Habitat animals & Terrarium animals, a new five-star campaign, new adorable gift shop items, 2 new interactive displays, new themed items and decorations, and 2 new animal-related rooms - habitat and welfare. 

Two Point Museum: Zooseum is available now on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5), and coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in Q1 2026.

#ign #gaming
title: Two Point Museum: Zooseum - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Superior Firepower Update Trailer for Tempest Rising, a real-time strategy base-building game developed by Slipgate Ironworks. Players are now greeted with the new Superior Firepower Update, fitted with a new superweapon for each faction, a global production queue for more efficient battlefield control, and more. The Superior Firepower Update for Tempest Rising is available now for PC (Steam).
title: Tempest Rising - Official Superior Firepower Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Modulus in this latest trailer for the upcoming factory automation game. Modulus version 1.0 will be available on PC in 2026, and an expanded and updated demo is out now on Steam.

In Modulus, you don’t just solve problems, you design the components that make up the solution. Build and automate elegant production systems using modular engineering tools: cut, paint, stamp, and assemble 3D building blocks called modules. From logic-driven problem solving to free-form expression, Modulus blends base-building, resource management, and thoughtful strategy in a game that rewards both beauty and efficiency. There’s no single solution, only the system you create.

#ign #gaming
title: Modulus - Official Updated Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Teaser Trailer for Gods, Death, & Reapers, an upcoming free-to-play action hack-and-slash extraction RPG developed by Wolcen Studio. Players will survive a brutal afterlife where mythology is reality, and the gods are long gone. Engage with a suite of different modes from Story Mode to PvPvE to fight for balance in Gods, Death, & Reapers, launching into Early Access in 2026 for PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Gods, Death, & Reapers - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into Death Howl in this latest trailer for the soulslike deck builder. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son. Journey through the sorrowful spirit world when Death Howl launches on PC (Steam, GOG, Windows PC, and PC Game Pass) on December 9, 2025. It will also be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Game Pass on February 19, 2026. A demo is out now on Steam.

#ign #gaming
title: Death Howl - Official 11 Facts Trailer | 11 Bit Studios Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Inkblood announcement trailer for the upcoming occult detective adventure game filled with murder, mystery and deceit, blending horror with the strangely cozy vibes of escape room-style puzzle solving. Inkblood will be available on PC in 2026.

Wicked sorcery abounds, rotting the minds of people and the very fabric of reality itself. Prove your worth as the Inquisitor, figure out what is happening, and don’t fail the Inquisition as your predecessor did.

#ign #gaming
title: Inkblood - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the ‘Line of Contact’ Update Trailer for War Thunder, a free-to-play vehicular combat game developed by Gaijin Entertainment. Players can gain access to an upcoming update called Line of Contact, packed with a new game mode that sees player-controlled infantry, modern weapons, customization, and more to bring the battle to a new landscape. The ‘Line of Contact’ Update Trailer for War Thunder is available now in closed beta for PC.

#ign #gaming
title: War Thunder - Official ‘Line of Contact’ Update Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the creepy The Boba Teashop trailer for this cozy horror game where you own and manage a boba tea shop. Prepare boba teas, serve customers, and expand your menu to grow your business. The Boba Teashop will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Nintendo Switch. It is already out on PC.
title: The Boba Teashop - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Space Warlord Baby Trading Simulator announcement trailer for this upcoming alien infant stock market sim. From the creators of I Am Your Beast, Space Warlord Baby Trading Simulator is an all-new arcade satire on stock markets and a ruthless exploration of capitalism, based in the same world as Strange Scaffold’s previous title Space Warlord Organ Trading Simulator. Space Warlord Baby Trading Simulator will be available on PC via Steam in 2026.

#ign #gaming
title: Space Warlord Baby Trading Simulator - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Old School Rally, an arcade retro racing simulation game developed by Frozen Lake Games. Players will partake in an array of international rally competitions with 32 unique rally cars across 24 rally stages in 10 different countries. Plan ahead for dynamic weather and nail corners in Old School Rally, available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Old School Rally - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Director's Cut Update Trailer for Conscript, an action survival horror game developed by Jordan Mochi and Catchweight Studio. Players can now access the all-new Director's Cut Update with version 2.0, offering new difficulty modes, items, achievements, QOL improvements, accessibility settings, and more. The Director's Cut Update for Conscript is available now for PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Conscript - Official Director's Cut Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
This is your one stop shop to find every collectible needed for 100% item completion in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond. This video will show you where to find all Energy Tanks, all missile expansions, all shot expansions, all power bomb expansions, and VI-O-LA boost tanks as well.

#IGN #gaming 

Timecodes:
00:00 Intro
00:05 Energy Tanks
06:57 Missile Expansions
26:12 Shot Expansions
45:37 Power Bomb Expansions
48:28 VI-O-LA Boost Tanks
title: Metroid Prime 4 - All Collectibles Guide - Energy Tanks, Missile Expansions, and More

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy this new gameplay from Fellhollow, the upcoming expansion to the Unreal Engine 5-powered open-world survival crafting game RuneScape: Dragonwilds that's out on December 15. 
Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1374490/RuneScape_Dragonwilds/

#IGN #Gaming #RuneScape
title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds - Fellhollow Expansion Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Announcement Trailer for Plague Doctor: Life in Pestilence, a medieval medical simulation game developed by PST Games. Players will evolve into a reputable doctor as the plague spreads day by day. Establish a clinic, gather resources, and perform surgeries to save those affected, or watch it all crumble. Plague Doctor: Life in Pestilence is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Plague Doctor: Life in Pestilence - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a look at the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Showgunners, a turn-based tactical strategy game developed by Artificer. Players will explore a neon-lit city packed with traps to avoid, puzzles to overcome, and enemies armed to the teeth. Showgunners is launching on February 19, 2026, for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S, with the game being available now on PC (Steam).
title: Showgunners - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Mist Trailer for Pioner, a first-person survival shooter developed by GFAGAMES. Players can become acquainted with Tartarus Island, a once quiet and peaceful place that's turned as diverse and unpredictable as the people who inhabit it. Explore Tartarus Island in Pioner, launching into Early Access on December 16 for PC (Steam).
title: Pioner - Official Mist Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'In Theaters This January' Teaser Trailer for The Lord of The Rings Trilogy, the iconic films based on the J.R.R. Tolkien novels, distributed by Fathom Entertainment. Fans can watch the legendary trilogy of movies in theaters to celebrate the upcoming 25th anniversary celebration of The Lord of The Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring. The Lord of The Rings Trilogy returns to theaters in January 16 through 18 and January 23 through 25 in 2026.

Peter Jackson’s award-winning “The Lord of the Rings Trilogy” includes: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, and The Return of the King. The Trilogy tells the story of a meek hobbit of The Shire and eight companions setting out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

The Lord of The Rings Trilogy returns to theaters in January 16 through 18 and January 23 through 25 in 2026.
title: The Lord of The Rings Trilogy - Official 25th Anniversary Teaser Trailer
